title: Water stress and droughts
description: Freshwater scarcity driven by droughts, population growth, and weak infrastructure.

title: Desertification
description: Soil degradation and expansion of deserts reduce agricultural productivity.

title: Water supply and sanitation
description: Limited access to safe drinking water and sanitation increases disease burden.

description: High particulate levels from transport, fuel burning, and dust.

description: Seasonal fires worsen air quality and threaten biodiversity.

description: Insufficient recycling capacity; leakage into soil and waterways.
